0: When we got back to our room we noticed there was no mini fridge or microwave
The runway facing rooms are not too loud
Staff said if rooms on the first floor are full dogs are allowed in other rooms
The hotel is a little outdated and my room had a strange sour smell as if the bathroom had been cleaned with dirty water
The tile flooring in the bathroom was very cold to walk on
To us there was no excuse especially when you are paying for a suite
This last visit I had 2 hairs in my shower and 1 hair on my pillowcase when I checked in

Hotel under construction and rooms in system did not match descriptions of what they were as they were under construction and changing them out Was given an ADA room that was not acomodating as it only had rails in the shower and I asked specifically for rails around the toilet and lower bed
Plus they charged us the same room rate for a weekend price

Very disappointed in the motel room there is no desk or working space for a business traveler outdated and worn tub with fluctuating temperature toilet difficult to get room temp regulated and very open sterile lobby
1: The food and service at the bar and dining room were very good
very nice room and comfortable bed
